document_data.name: Ekim Cyre
document_data.mainbody: '''Ekim Cyre''' was a [[greater werewyvern]] who served the [[blue dragon]] [[Abazigal]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Abilities:
Ekin could readily change between his [[wyvern]] and his [[humanoid]] forms.

He had an inherent resistance against the elements and could not be harmed by non-[[item enchantment|magical]] weapons.
document_data.Activities: Ekim defended the upper levels of [[Abazigal's enclave]], in the caverns above the flooded tunnel system.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, Ekim was slain by the [[Bhaalspawn]] [[Abdel Adrian]] and his fellow companions when they stormed the enclave in search of Abazigal.
